title: Foetal exposure to medicines can affect brain development of infants: Study
description: Pregnant mothers may need treatment for their medical conditions, such as mood disorders or epilepsy.
content:

description: A longer interval between the first two doses of the COVID-19 vaccine may boost antibody levels up to nine-fold, according to a study conducted in the UK.
content:

description: Yes, we agree that diabetes is not a good disorder to have. But if you can control your diet and fit in some regular exercise, it is mostly a manageable condition.
